archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Attach Problem Record Number and other attributes to Crisis Teams Channel
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Each crisis should have its own separate Teams Channel in Microsoft Teams.
To be stored in an excel checklist document in the specific Crisis Teams channel
Full list of attributes from meeting with Jari Paloch: 1. MIM number 2. Problem number 3. Resolution time of the problem ticket 4. Duration of MIM 5. Duration of Problem 6. Duration of Crisis
